actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain disclosures of cell phone numbers.
short_title: Consumer Cellphone Number Distribution Protection Act of 2009

summary.text: Consumer Cellphone Number Distribution Protection Act of 2009 - Amends the federal criminal code to impose a fine and/or prison term of up to six months for knowingly disclosing a wireless subscriber's unlisted cell phone number to another, for gain, without the express permission of such subscriber.

titles.title: Consumer Cellphone Number Distribution Protection Act of 2009
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain disclosures of cell phone numbers.
